__inputs.name: DS_PROMETHEUS
__inputs.label: Prometheus
__inputs.description: Prometheus data source for Daytona sandbox metrics

description: Comprehensive CPU, Memory, and Disk monitoring for Daytona Sandboxes using Prometheus metrics from OpenTelemetry.

panels.description: Total number of active sandboxes reporting metrics
panels.title: Sandbox Count

panels.description: Count of services exceeding resource thresholds (CPU > 80%, Memory > 80%, or Disk > 80%)
panels.title: Critical Services

panels.description: Detailed metrics per service including CPU, Memory, and Disk utilization with limits
panels.title: Services Resource Overview

panels.description: CPU usage percentage over time per service
panels.title: CPU Utilization by Service

panels.description: Memory usage percentage over time per service
panels.title: Memory Utilization by Service

panels.description: Disk usage percentage over time per service
panels.title: Disk Utilization by Service

panels.description: Services with highest average CPU usage over the last hour
panels.title: Top CPU Consumers

panels.description: Services with highest average memory usage over the last hour
panels.title: Top Memory Consumers

panels.description: Services with highest average disk usage over the last hour
panels.title: Top Disk Consumers

panels.description: Combined weighted score of CPU (33%), Memory (33%), and Disk (34%) utilization
panels.title: Resource Pressure Score

panels.description: CPU usage percentage over time per service
panels.title: CPU Utilization Timeseries

panels.description: Current CPU utilization percentage by service with threshold coloring
panels.title: Current CPU by Service

panels.description: CPU cores limit, average, and peak usage per service
panels.title: CPU Limit by Service

panels.description: Distribution of CPU usage values over time
panels.title: CPU Usage Heatmap

panels.description: Memory usage percentage over time per service
panels.title: Memory Utilization Timeseries

panels.description: Current memory utilization percentage by service with threshold coloring
panels.title: Current Memory by Service

panels.description: Absolute memory usage in gigabytes over time
panels.title: Memory Usage in GB

panels.description: Memory used, limit, average, and peak utilization per service
panels.title: Memory Limits and Usage

panels.description: Disk usage percentage over time per service
panels.title: Disk Utilization Timeseries

panels.description: Current disk utilization percentage by service with threshold coloring
panels.title: Current Disk by Service

panels.description: Absolute disk usage in gigabytes over time
panels.title: Disk Usage in GB

panels.description: Disk space used, available, total, and utilization percentage per service
panels.title: Disk Space Breakdown

list.description: Prometheus data source containing Daytona sandbox metrics
list.label: Data Source
list.name: datasource

list.description: Time aggregation interval for averaging metrics
list.label: Interval
list.name: interval

title: Daytona Sandbox Resource Monitoring
